   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Task Finder's Documentation!
=======================================
**Task Finder** is a web-based tool to create simple task and automation.

Access here: https://eu999k16tsks02.emea.sitel-world.net/taskfinder

Web-Based Scheduler
-------------------
**Task Finder** comes with a scheduler where you can search, schedule and run your jobs directly 
on the interface.


Centralized Database and SFTP Connection
----------------------------------------
Manage all database and SFTP connections in one place with **Task Finder**.
